org.sat4j.specs

インタフェース IConstr

  • 既知のサブインタフェースのリスト:
    Constr, IWatchPb, PBConstr
    既知の実装クラスのリスト:
    AtLeast, AtLeastPB, BinaryClause, BinaryClauses, CBClause, ConstrGroup, HTClause, LearntBinaryClause, LearntBinaryClausePB, LearntHTClause, LearntHTClausePB, LearntWLClause, MaxWatchCard, MaxWatchPb, MaxWatchPbLong, MaxWatchPbLongCP, MinWatchCard, MinWatchCardPB, MinWatchPb, MinWatchPbLong, MinWatchPbLongCP, OriginalBinaryClause, OriginalBinaryClausePB, OriginalHTClause, OriginalHTClausePB, OriginalWLClause, PuebloMinWatchPb, UnitClause, UnitClausePB, UnitClauses, UnitClausesPB, WatchPb, WatchPbLong, WatchPbLongCP, WLClause

    public interface IConstr
    The most general abstraction for handling a constraint.

    • メソッドのサマリー

      すべてのメソッド インスタンス・メソッド abstractメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      boolean canBePropagatedMultipleTimes()
      Partition constraints into the ones that only propagate once (e.g.
      int get(int i)
      returns the ith literal in the constraint
      double getActivity()
      To obtain the activity of the constraint.
      boolean learnt() 
      int size() 
      java.lang.String toString(VarMapper mapper)
      Produces a human readable representation of the constraint, using a specific mapping.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • learnt

        boolean learnt()
        戻り値:
        true iff the clause was learnt during the search

      • size

        int size()
        戻り値:
        the number of literals in the constraint.

      • get

        int get(int i)
        returns the ith literal in the constraint
        パラメータ:
        i - the index of the literal
        戻り値:
        a literal

      • getActivity

        double getActivity()
        To obtain the activity of the constraint.
        戻り値:
        the activity of the clause.
        導入されたバージョン:
        2.1

      • canBePropagatedMultipleTimes

        boolean canBePropagatedMultipleTimes()
        Partition constraints into the ones that only propagate once (e.g. clauses and cardinality constraints) and the ones that can be propagated several times (e.g. pseudo-boolean constraints).
        戻り値:
        true if the constraint can propagate literals at different decision levels.
        導入されたバージョン:
        2.3.1

      • toString

        java.lang.String toString(VarMapper mapper)
        Produces a human readable representation of the constraint, using a specific mapping.
        導入されたバージョン:
        2.3.6
